name: 2nd edition of World Infectious Diseases Webinar
content: After successful completion of 1st webinar, WCID is pleased to announcing the 2nd webinar on Infectious Diseases Virtual 2020 which is going to held during August 18-19, 2020 With the theme “Unraveling the convolution in Infectious Diseases” Infectious Diseases Virtual 2020 will offer an impressive roaster of speakers, quality attendees and compelling content. This is an excellent opportunity for leading academic scientists, researchers, and scholars from universities and institutes to interact with the world-class scientists. For more information about webinar PS: https://infectious-diseases-conferences.magnusgroup.org/webinar-online-event Below mentioned are some of the scientific sessions: • Infectious Diseases • Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) • Bacterial Infectious Diseases • Vaccines and Vaccination • Viral Infectious Diseases • Fungal Infectious Diseases • Research on Medicine and Vaccine for Covid-19 • Neuro Infectious Diseases • Antimicrobials/Antibiotics/Antibacterial • Pediatric Infectious Diseases • Veterinary diseases • Infection, Immunity and Inflammation • Blood infectious Diseases • Plants Diseases and Control on Fungal Infection Recommended: Infectious Diseases Virtual 2020 | Infectious Diseases Webinars | Corona Virus (Covid-19) Webinars | Infection Online Events | Infection Online Summits | Covid-19 Online Meetings
